channel.title: hiking on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in hiking on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Camping At Big Foot Beach State Park
item.description: Another summer, another camping. This time at Big Foot Beach State Park, Lake Geneva. It is located very close to the lake and is right in the city. Four of us camped from Friday evening to Sunday morning with two friends visting Saturday night. Some pictures from camping at Big Foot beach State Park. Tent Campfire Sky Some Trail

item.title: Camping At Devil's Lake State Park, Wisconsin
item.description: On a Friday’s evening, eight of us set out to Devil’s Lake State Park, Wisconsin in two cars. We reached when it was dark and setup three tents in two camps. The rain god was happy and decided not to play spoilsport; it poured only when we were in the tent. We setup campfire, prepared dinner. Made s’more in the campfire for the first time; I had no clue what s’more was!
